posts.message: An Egyptian startup is selected as well "InstaBug"
posts.caption: gigaom.com
posts.description: Eight companies from around the world are a part of Google for Entrepreneurs’ first accelerator intensive with Blackbox.

posts.message:
We look for php developer 1 to 3 years experience.
Good understanding of software engineering concepts.
Decent problem solving, algorithms, and research skills.
Knowledge of common web technologies.
Basic JavaScript skills.
Basic HTML and CSS skills.
Familiarity with jQuery.
Familiarity with PHP MVC frameworks (Cakephp, CodeIgniter).
Familiarity with CMS (Joomla, Wordpress).

pleas send your update CV to jobs@cairoportal.net

Practices Regarding Government Access to User Data

posts.message:
I wanted to calculate how many people can fit in Tahrir Square, so I made a django project  to do it. The user specifies the area & the website calculates the approximate number of people who can fit in this area.

Feel free to do whatever you want with it.
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: HowManyPeopleFitHere - Measure how many people fit in a certain area.
